#Survivor "I get to compete against two grandmas," says Hayden, if you were worried we might be short on age or gender stereotypes tonight.

— Amy celebrates Wrinkle in Time instead of XMas (@spooloflies) December 16, 2013

The fake boobs are throwing off Laura M‚Äôs equilibrium. #Survivor

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) December 16, 2013

Future Survivor twist idea: tribe of moms (Monica, Tina, Laura M, Lisa W, Dawn, etc.), vs. tribe of bros (Malcolm, Hayden, Eddie, Reynold).

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) December 16, 2013

I can‚Äôt figure out if Tyson is trying to look like Tina or Monica at this point. Either way he‚Äôs killing the skinny old lady look. #Survivor

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) December 16, 2013

Gervase plays Survivor like a guy who has the word ‚ÄúPagong‚Äù tattooed on his left arm.

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) December 16, 2013

So refreshing to have a mom on Survivor who doesn‚Äôt cry all the time. Of course Monica had her tear ducts removed by a plastic surgeon, but‚Ä¶

— Max Dawson (@fymaxwell) December 16, 2013

Sometimes Monica doubts her own commitment to SparkleMotion. #Survivor
